title: 开游戏就崩溃
author: qq790716365
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.

Time: 15-7-5 下午3:50
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
953480384 发表于 2015-7-20 03:53
高级太阳能删掉
不是高级太阳能，而是和风。删 和风.jar

replies.author: yhrcyt
replies.txt_content:
ItIsEnderman 发表于 2015-7-20 07:25
不是高级太阳能，而是和风。删 和风.jar
支持，你看倒数第五行（和风.jar）后面写了一个Errored

replies.author: wangyunyang1998
replies.txt_content:
同，把和风删掉，可能是出错了，另外最好把内存稍微加大一点
 Wa{1.7.10.11} [Wa] (和风.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Errored

replies.author: Xy_
replies.txt_content: 把和风mod删了  有冲突。
